caption: Clockwise from top: a memorial on Sunday for the victims of the crowd surge in the Itaewon district of Seoul; relatives of missing people weeping at a community center; the 11-foot-wide alleyway where most of the deaths occurred. Over 150 people suffocated.
image_1.context: Late Saturday evening, they crowded into bars and nightclubs pumping out the latest K-pop hits and spilled into the tight alleys that wind through the city’s Itaewon neighborhood. They snacked on the Greek, Turkish, Italian and other SEOUL — It was supposed to be a festive evening, throngs of raucous youngsters dressed as zombies, princesses and superheroes converging on one of Seoul’s most popular nightlife districts for their first restriction-free Halloween celebration since the pandemic began. This article is by Choe Sang-Hun, John Yoon, Paul Mozur, Victoria Kim, Lee Su-Hyun and Jin Yu Young. Deadly Crush Leaves Seoul In Mourning VOL. CLXXII . . . . No. 59,593 © 2022 The New York Times Company NEW YORK, MONDAY, OCTOBER 31, 2022
image_1.description: The image is a collage of three photographs related to a tragic event in the Itaewon district of Seoul. The top photograph shows a memorial scene where a man, dressed in a black suit and wearing a face mask, is kneeling on a mat in front of a makeshift shrine. The shrine is filled with numerous white flowers, candles, and personal items such as bottles and notes, indicating a somber and respectful atmosphere. Yellow caution tape is visible in the background, suggesting a restricted area. The middle photograph depicts a narrow alleyway, approximately 11 feet wide, with debris scattered on the ground, including plastic cups, bottles, and other litter. This alleyway is identified as the location where most of the deaths occurred due to a crowd surge. The bottom photograph captures a moment at a community center where relatives of missing people are weeping. One woman, wearing glasses and a blue shirt, is holding her face in her hands, conveying a sense of grief and distress. The overall mood of the images conveys a deep sense of mourning and tragedy.

image_2.description: The image depicts a lively and crowded scene where an elderly man with white hair is being greeted by a large group of people. The man is standing in the back of an open-top vehicle, possibly a convertible car, and is reaching out to touch hands with the crowd. He is wearing a light blue shirt and appears to be smiling or speaking. The crowd around him is enthusiastic, with many people holding up their smartphones to take photos or record videos. Several individuals are waving Brazilian flags, indicating a patriotic or political event. The atmosphere is energetic and celebratory, with people cheering and reaching out to interact with the man. The background shows a mix of people, some wearing casual clothing and others in more formal attire. The overall mood conveyed is one of excitement and support.

image_3.description: The image depicts a lively beach scene with several surfers enjoying the waves. The main focus is on a group of people engaged in surfing activities. In the foreground, two individuals are standing in shallow water, possibly preparing to enter the waves or having just finished their ride. One of them appears to be wearing a wetsuit and holding a surfboard. Further back, multiple surfers are visible in various stages of their activity: some are paddling out to catch a wave, while others are riding the waves. One surfer is notably airborne, performing a jump or trick above a breaking wave. The ocean is depicted with rolling waves, indicating active surfing conditions. The sky is clear with a warm, golden hue, suggesting either early morning or late afternoon light. The overall atmosphere conveys a sense of excitement and enjoyment associated with surfing. The background shows the horizon where the sea meets the sky, adding depth to the scene.

The background consists of vibrant hues of pink, yellow, green, and blue, creating a dynamic and lively atmosphere. The person is dressed in a brownish-yellow garment that appears to be a traditional or cultural outfit. The overall mood of the image conveys a sense of energy and creativity, with the abstract background enhancing the artistic feel of the scene.

image_5.description: The image captures a moment of joy and pride, featuring a man wearing a black jacket with an orange Houston Astros logo on the sleeve. He is smiling broadly and giving a thumbs-up gesture with his right hand, which holds a small orange object that appears to be a toy or a piece of fruit. He is wearing a black cap with the Houston Astros logo, indicating his affiliation with the team. To his left, there is a woman with dark hair tied back, wearing a blue top and gold earrings, who is also smiling warmly. In the background, another person, a young man with short hair, is visible, looking down and slightly away from the camera. The setting appears to be indoors, possibly in a stadium or a similar venue, given the context provided in the caption about Yordan Alvarez’s parents seeing him play for the Astros. The overall atmosphere conveyed by the image is one of happiness and familial pride.
